title: Reels & TikTok
description: Short videos that sell. Increase reach and gain new customers.
content:
In today's world, attention is the most valuable currency. As an experienced content creator, I know that Instagram Reels, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts are currently the most effective way to reach thousands of new customers organically.

It's not just about 'filming something'. Social media algorithms are unforgiving. They require dynamics, strict structure (hook, value, CTA), and technical quality. That's exactly what I deliver.

My packages cover everything from brainstorming trending concepts, through efficient shooting (up to 8 videos per day), to final editing with captions and effects that keep the viewer's attention.

title: Creative Production
description: Commercial spots, image videos, and campaigns tailored to your brand.
content:
Every brand has a story. My job is to tell yours in a way that evokes emotion and the desire to buy. Creative production is about building a premium image through the eyes of a professional filmmaker.

Whether you need a TV commercial, a website image video, or a series of product videos, I provide complete service. From initial idea and storyboard, through casting actors and locations, to cinematic lighting and high-end post-production.

I am not just a 'guy with a camera'. I think like a marketer. Video must not only look world-class but must also fulfill your business goals.

title: Event Video & Conferences
description: Premium coverage for conferences and B2B events. CEO interviews, reports, and full recordings.
content:
Organizing a key conference or corporate summit? Video isn't just a memory; it's a business asset. Professional coverage builds trust with stakeholders and attracts sponsors for future editions.

I specialize in B2B events where professionalism and discretion are paramount. I capture interviews with speakers, VIP guests, and CEOs. The result is not just a highlight reel, but content that sells your brand year-round.

In partnership with SocialVids, we handle large international events with multi-person crews.

title: Live Stream & Webinars
description: Reliable streaming for conferences and webinars. Anywhere in London, Prague or Europe.
content:
Hybrid events are the new standard. Allow participation for those who can't attend in person and maximize your event's reach. I deliver a technically flawless stream that represents your company professionally.

No amateur mobile attempts. Professional audio, real-time multi-camera editing, and direct presentation integration. Perfect for press conferences, AGM meetings, and corporate training.

We stream to secure platforms for internal use or publicly to YouTube/LinkedIn for maximum reach.

title: Post-production
description: Already have footage? We'll turn it into a professional video.
content:
Have a full drive of footage from a vacation, drone, or past corporate events but don't know what to do with it? Post-production is where the magic happens.

Deliver your 'raw' data, and I will create an engaging video. I'll edit it to the beat, clean the audio, color grade the image, and add modern graphics.

I also specialize in creating captions for social media and repurposing content – I can cut one long interview into 10 short clips for TikTok.

title: Voiceover
description: Professional voice for your videos. Ads, spots, e-learning.
content:
Visuals are only half the experience. A professional voiceover adds credibility and emotion to your video. You may recognize my voice from ads for brands like Plzeňský Prazdroj, ČSOB, or Oreo.

I have my own professional recording studio, which means two things: top-notch sound quality and extreme speed. I deliver most orders within 24 hours.

Whether you need a 'punchy' voice for an ad, a calm tone for e-learning, or character dubbing, we will find the right style.

title: International Event Video Production
description: Professional event video coverage in Berlin, London, Prague & across Europe. Bilingual service (EN/CZ), all travel costs included. One videographer for all your European events.
content:
Consistent Quality Across Europe

Organizing a conference in Berlin? A product launch in London? A corporate summit in Vienna? You need one videographer who delivers the same premium quality everywhere — not a different local vendor in each city who doesn't understand your brand.

I'm Tomáš, a bilingual (English/Czech) event videographer based in Prague, covering B2B events across Europe. My filmmaker background means you get cinematic quality with business ROI focus — your video needs to generate leads and build authority, not just look pretty.

Why One International Videographer?

  • Brand consistency — Same look, feel, and quality across all your events in every city
  • Cost-effective — No need to brief and manage multiple local vendors. Bundle discounts for multi-city tours
  • Bilingual communication — English and Czech fluent, German basics for Berlin. No language barriers with international attendees
  • Single point of contact — One person who knows your brand, your stakeholders, and your goals

Cities We Cover

Primary: Prague (home base), Berlin, London, Vienna, Munich

On request: Paris, Amsterdam, Bratislava, Warsaw, and other European cities

What's Included in Every Package

  • Pre-event consultation (video call)
  • Travel to event city (flights, accommodation, per diem — all included in quote)
  • 1-2 camera operators depending on package
  • Professional cinema equipment (cameras, wireless audio, LED lights, gimbals)
  • Full event coverage: main stage + networking + interviews
  • CEO interviews and attendee testimonials
  • Professional editing and color grading
  • Delivery in 5-7 days (express 48h available)
  • Multiple formats: full video + social media cuts

Pricing

Berlin Package: from €3,500 — Full day, 2 cameras, 1 edited video (5-10 min), travel included, 7-day delivery

London Package: from €4,200 — Full day, 2 cameras, 1 edited video (5-10 min), travel included, 7-day delivery

Multi-City Tour: Custom quote — 3+ cities = 15% discount. Week-long tours with consistent coverage across all stops

All prices include travel costs. No hidden fees. Arrive 1 day before event for scouting.

Add-ons

  • Livestream to YouTube/LinkedIn
  • Drone footage (where permitted)
  • Photography coverage
  • Multi-language subtitles
  • Same-day highlight reel for social media
  • On-site editor for same-day delivery

title: Bilingual Event Moderator & Conference Host
description: Professional MC and moderator for international conferences, panel discussions, and corporate events. Bilingual English/Czech. Experienced with tech, corporate, and startup events.
content:
Keep Your Event Flowing Smoothly

A great event needs more than great speakers — it needs someone who connects the dots. As a bilingual event moderator with a filmmaker background, I bring a unique combination: professional stage presence, camera comfort, and the ability to switch seamlessly between English and Czech.

What I Bring to Your Event

  • Professional Presence — Camera-comfortable (filmmaker background), confident on stage, appropriate for corporate/B2B settings
  • Bilingual Excellence — Fluent English and Czech with seamless language switching. No awkward pauses or confusion
  • Preparation Obsessed — I study all speakers and topics in advance, prepare engaging questions, know the audience, and adapt on the fly
  • Energy & Timing — Keep energy high throughout, manage time strictly, smooth transitions, handle unexpected situations calmly

Services I Offer

  • Conference Moderator — Full-day or multi-day conferences. Introduce speakers, manage Q&A, keep schedule on track
  • Panel Discussion Host — Research topics and panelists, prepare thought-provoking questions, facilitate engaging discussion
  • Product Launch MC — Energetic product unveiling, demo presentations, audience engagement
  • Awards Ceremony Host — Professional ceremony hosting, award presentations, entertaining between segments
  • Webinar & Virtual Event Host — Online conference moderation, manage virtual audience questions, engaging on camera

Why a Filmmaker Makes the Best Moderator

My background as a filmmaker is my secret weapon. I understand cameras and production, know how to position myself for great footage, and I create "moment-worthy" content naturally. Your event video will look better because your moderator knows what looks good on camera.

Pricing

Half-Day Event (4 hours): €800 — Pre-event consultation, full preparation, 4 hours on-site, post-event debrief

Full-Day Event (8 hours): €1,400 — Pre-event consultation, full preparation, 8 hours on-site, post-event debrief

Multi-Day Conference: €1,200/day — 2+ days at discounted rate, consistent energy throughout

Virtual Event: €600 (half-day) / €1,000 (full-day) — Zoom, Teams, StreamYard experience

Add-ons: Custom script writing (€200), travel outside Prague (cost + per diem)

Booking Process

  1. Initial Call (30 min, free) — Discuss event details, confirm availability, align on style and tone
  2. Event Brief — Send event schedule, speaker bios, topics, audience info
  3. Preparation (1-2 weeks before) — I research all topics and speakers, prepare questions and scripts
  4. Rehearsal (optional) — Venue walkthrough, tech check with AV team, timing run-through
  5. Event Day — Arrive 2 hours early, final prep and coordination, host professionally

title: Corporate Actor & Spokesperson
description: Professional corporate actor for training videos, product demos, and brand spokesperson roles. Bilingual (EN/CZ), camera-natural, corporate-appropriate.
content:
Your Brand Needs a Face

Not every company has a photogenic CEO who's comfortable on camera. That's where a professional corporate actor comes in. I bring your brand message to life — naturally, confidently, and with the polish your stakeholders expect.

What I Do

  • Training & E-Learning Videos — Professional presenter for corporate training modules. Clear delivery, perfect pacing, bilingual options
  • Product Demonstrations — Confident product showcase for trade shows, websites, and social media
  • Brand Spokesperson — Represent your brand at events, in videos, and in media. Professional appearance and demeanor
  • Testimonial Actor — Authentic-looking testimonial videos for marketing campaigns
  • Corporate Explainer Videos — Complex topics explained clearly and engagingly on camera

Why Choose Me?

Unlike typical actors, I come from a filmmaker and business background. I understand what makes content convert, not just what looks good. I know the technical side — angles, lighting, teleprompter — so productions run faster and cost less.

Bilingual advantage: Film in English AND Czech in the same session. Perfect for companies operating in both markets.

Pricing

Half-Day Shoot: from €600 — Up to 4 hours, preparation included

Full-Day Shoot: from €1,000 — Up to 8 hours, wardrobe changes, multiple setups

Campaign Package: Custom quote — Multiple shoot days, consistent character/spokesperson role

Usage Rights: 12 months standard, extended licensing available
